description: This file defines a Flutter UI screen for displaying a list of events. It includes UI components like AppBar, FloatingActionButton, and a list of EventCards, and interacts with an EventProvider for state management. It also references widgets for event creation and models for event data.

classes.name: EventsScreen
classes.description: A StatelessWidget that displays a list of events and provides UI to add new events.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the Flutter UI for the events screen, including the list view and dialog for adding new events.
